title: Manage C-Store Inventory
description: A manager of a gas station with a convenience store (C-store) needs to reorder drinks and snacks.

tasks.description: Run a sales report to identify the fastest-moving items over the past week.
tasks.expected_outcome: A report showing top-selling items is generated.

tasks.description: Check the current on-hand inventory for the top-selling items.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system shows that several popular items are below their reorder point.

tasks.description: Automatically generate a purchase order for the items that are below their reorder points and send it to the main supplier.
tasks.expected_outcome: A purchase order is created and sent to the supplier to restock the C-store.
